name: A Lot of Spread
description:
GAMEPLAY

You, play as a beloved mayor of 16 loyal citizens, is facing a virus invasion crisis. 

At the start of the game, one of your citizens will be infected, and it will spread to another person in 20 seconds. 

Your job is to isolate all infection cases into the hospital or quarantine area before the virus spread to everyone in the public place. 

You can use symptom to help you identify potential patients, the higher the frequency of symptoms, the higher the chance the person is infected. However, having symptoms does not mean 100% infection.

There are 3 areas in the game you can utilize

Public Place: The virus can spread freely in this area
Quarantine Area: The virus can't spread in this area.
Hospital: Hospital can discover the virus and diagnose virus carrier, but it takes time to check a person. The virus can't spread in this area.

Control

Mouse drag & drop
